data.text:
As part of training, mock races are held on campus. Today, it 
seems like Silence Suzuka will be participating.
data.processed:
<story>As part of training, mock races are held on campus. Today, it 
<story>seems like Silence Suzuka will be participating.

data.text:
While I was a little concerned about what happened in the library 
the other day, I came to spectate…
data.processed:
<story>While I was a little concerned about what happened in the library 
<story>the other day, I came to spectate…

data.text:
Suzuka, you understand what the goal 
of today's mock race is, right?
data.name: Suzuka's Trainer
data.processed:
<story>Suzuka, you understand what the goal 
<story>of today's mock race is, right?

data.text: Um… applying what I learned in preparation for my debut race.
data.name: Silence Suzuka
data.processed: <story>Um… applying what I learned in preparation for my debut race.

data.text: That's right. Your debut race next month is approaching.
data.name: Suzuka's Trainer
data.processed: <story>That's right. Your debut race next month is approaching.

data.text:
Which is exactly why you should go out there and make this new 
"Planned Speed Control" running style yours!
data.name: Suzuka's Trainer
data.processed:
<story>Which is exactly why you should go out there and make this new 
<story>"Planned Speed Control" running style yours!

data.text: …Yes.
data.name: Silence Suzuka
data.processed: <story>…Yes.

data.text:
I've been looking forward to this day, Suzuka. I'll have you show 
me how much you've grown under that trainer.
data.name: Air Groove
data.processed:
<story>I've been looking forward to this day, Suzuka. I'll have you show 
<story>me how much you've grown under that trainer.

data.text: Yeah. I won't let you take the lead.
data.name: Silence Suzuka
data.processed: <story>Yeah. I won't let you take the lead.

data.text:
Fuu, I'll return those words right back at you. 
Well then, I'll be heading off first.
data.name: Air Groove
data.processed:
<story>Fuu, I'll return those words right back at you. 
<story>Well then, I'll be heading off first.

data.text:
Just like I was taught, hold back at first, 
saving my power until the end
data.name: Silence Suzuka
data.processed:
<story>Just like I was taught, hold back at first, 
<story>saving my power until the end

data.text:
Yeah… it'll be alright. It's the correct 
method after all… I'll definitely win.
data.name: Silence Suzuka
data.processed:
<story>Yeah… it'll be alright. It's the correct 
<story>method after all… I'll definitely win.

data.text: And thus, Silence Suzuka's mock race began. However…
data.processed: <story>And thus, Silence Suzuka's mock race began. However…

data.text: Haa… haa… haaa…!
data.name: Silence Suzuka
data.processed: <story>Haa… haa… haaa…!

data.text: No… not yet, I still need to hold back…!
data.name: Silence Suzuka
data.processed: <story>No… not yet, I still need to hold back…!

data.text: Suzuka…?
data.name: Air Groove
data.processed: <story>Suzuka…?

data.text:
Even though in the Selection Race she took such a huge lead, it 
looks like today she's not taking the lead from the start.
data.processed:
<story>Even though in the Selection Race she took such a huge lead, it 
<story>looks like today she's not taking the lead from the start.

data.text:
Perhaps, her trainer's instructions were 
to use "Planned Speed Control". But…
data.processed:
<story>Perhaps, her trainer's instructions were 
<story>to use "Planned Speed Control". But…

data.text: Uu… kuu…
data.name: Silence Suzuka
data.processed: <story>Uu… kuu…

data.text:
She was surrounded by the other girls, it seemed like she was 
being constrained… and looked distressed.
data.processed:
<story>She was surrounded by the other girls, it seemed like she was 
<story>being constrained… and looked distressed.

data.text: And then, towards the end of the race-
data.processed: <story>And then, towards the end of the race-

data.text: The last straight…! Now…!
data.name: Silence Suzuka
data.processed: <story>The last straight…! Now…!

data.text: H-huh? My legs…I can't put in any power…!
data.name: Silence Suzuka
data.processed: <story>H-huh? My legs…I can't put in any power…!

data.text: …I'll end this!
data.name: Air Groove
data.processed: <story>…I'll end this!

data.text: Ah…!
data.name: Silence Suzuka
data.processed: <story>Ah…!

data.text:
Air Groove and the other girls entered the final 
spurt. Silence Suzuka was buried in that group 
and they passed her one after another…
data.processed:
<story>Air Groove and the other girls entered the final 
<story>spurt. Silence Suzuka was buried in that group 
<story>and they passed her one after another…

data.text: I can't see the front…
data.name: Silence Suzuka
data.processed: <story>I can't see the front…

data.text: I can't see… that scenery…
data.name: Silence Suzuka
data.processed: <story>I can't see… that scenery…

data.text: 8th… An unfortunate result, isn't it?
data.name: Suzuka's Trainer
data.processed: <story>8th… An unfortunate result, isn't it?

data.text:
You held back in the beginning like instructed, 
so I think it's a good result. But, at the end your 
running wasn't as sharp. What happened?
data.name: Suzuka's Trainer
data.processed:
<story>You held back in the beginning like instructed, 
<story>so I think it's a good result. But, at the end your 
<story>running wasn't as sharp. What happened?

data.name: Silence Suzuka
data.processed: <story>…

data.text: Suzuka?…is something wrong?
data.name: Suzuka's Trainer
data.processed: <story>Suzuka?…is something wrong?

data.text: Ah… I-I'm sorry. Um…
data.name: Silence Suzuka
data.processed: <story>Ah… I-I'm sorry. Um…

data.text:
…I'm sorry, I don't know. I don't… 
really understand it myself…
data.name: Silence Suzuka
data.processed:
<story>…I'm sorry, I don't know. I don't… 
<story>really understand it myself…

data.text:
…I see. It looks like it'll take a bit longer 
to make that new running style your own.
data.name: Suzuka's Trainer
data.processed:
<story>…I see. It looks like it'll take a bit longer 
<story>to make that new running style your own.

data.text:
Then, let's cancel your debut race for now. After 
all, there's no need to rush right now.
data.name: Suzuka's Trainer
data.processed:
<story>Then, let's cancel your debut race for now. After 
<story>all, there's no need to rush right now.

data.text: Eh…?!
data.name: Silence Suzuka
data.processed: <story>Eh…?!

data.text: Cancel my debut… a-are you telling me not to run?!
data.name: Silence Suzuka
data.processed: <story>Cancel my debut… a-are you telling me not to run?!

data.text:
Please, calm down. I'm just saying we should wait. Once you get 
more used to the new running style we can enter-
data.name: Suzuka's Trainer
data.processed:
<story>Please, calm down. I'm just saying we should wait. Once you get 
<story>more used to the new running style we can enter-

data.text: Please wait, I can run! No, I want to run…!
data.name: Silence Suzuka
data.processed: <story>Please wait, I can run! No, I want to run…!

data.text: Running in the lead is my-
data.name: Silence Suzuka
data.processed: <story>Running in the lead is my-

data.text:
But, you're not used to running like 
this. You understand that, right?
data.name: Suzuka's Trainer
data.processed:
<story>But, you're not used to running like 
<story>this. You understand that, right?

data.text: …uu.
data.name: Silence Suzuka
data.processed: <story>…uu.

data.text:
Suzuka, please listen. I just want you to be 
in perfect condition for your debut race.
data.name: Suzuka's Trainer
data.processed:
<story>Suzuka, please listen. I just want you to be 
<story>in perfect condition for your debut race.

data.text:
Take your time to learn the new running style… it 
won't be too late after that, right?
data.name: Suzuka's Trainer
data.processed:
<story>Take your time to learn the new running style… it 
<story>won't be too late after that, right?

data.text: When is 'after that'…?
data.name: Silence Suzuka
data.processed: <story>When is 'after that'…?

data.text: Eh? Sorry, did you say something…?
data.name: Suzuka's Trainer
data.processed: <story>Eh? Sorry, did you say something…?

data.text: …sorry, nothing.
data.name: Silence Suzuka
data.processed: <story>…sorry, nothing.

data.text: I'm… heading home for today.
data.name: Silence Suzuka
data.processed: <story>I'm… heading home for today.

data.text:
Leaving the course with shoulders sagging, Silence Suzuka's back 
was like a lost child's. It was painful to look…
data.processed:
<story>Leaving the course with shoulders sagging, Silence Suzuka's back 
<story>was like a lost child's. It was painful to look…
